job_title: Magna Engineered Glass: Supplier Quality Engineer
job_description:
• DevOps EngineerlocationsLowell, Massachusetts, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00197256Principal Software Engineer – Linux/BSPlocationsSouthfield, Michigan, USposted onPosted 20 Days AgoR00205992Senior Electrical Hardware EngineerlocationsGrand Rapids, Michigan, USposted onPosted 5 Days AgoR00210039Sr.

• DevOps EngineerlocationsLowell, Massachusetts, USposted onPosted 11 Days AgoR00209295Junior ChemistlocationsGrand Rapids, Michigan, USposted onPosted YesterdayR00210231Senior Manager, Program Management Industrial Solutionslocations2 Locationsposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00205224Senior Category Manager, SemiconductorslocationsSouthfield, Michigan, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00170644Engineer Sr Staff - SoftwarelocationsGoleta, California, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00182947Cloud Solutions Architect, Smart Factory SolutionslocationsTroy, Michigan, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00187092Controls/Automation EngineerlocationsTroy, Michigan, USposted onPosted 26 Days AgoR00203332Magna Engineered Glass: Validation / Chem Lab SupervisorlocationsHolland, Michigan, USposted onPosted 29 Days AgoR00194909Expert, Business Process Optimizationlocations2 Locationsposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00198754eMotor Design EngineerlocationsTroy, Michigan, USposted onPosted YesterdayR00198172Simulation EngineerlocationsTroy, Michigan, USposted onPosted 14 Days AgoR00200693IT SupervisorlocationsMoore, South Carolina, USposted onPosted 6 Days AgoR00208763Magna Engineered Glass: Supplier Quality EngineerlocationsHolland, Michigan, USposted onPosted YesterdayR00210710.

• Architect Scalable Distributed Systems: Leverage deep software engineering skills to design, develop, and implement reliable, performant, and inherently scalable distributed systems within a dynamic cloud environment.
• 2-5 years of direct, hands-on experience in relevant industry and/or academic settings, showcasing your ability to deliver tangible results.
• Demonstrable expertise in Machine Learning at scale, with practical experience in Large Language Models, Self-Supervised/Contrastive/Representation Learning for Computer Vision applications, and multi-modal data integration.
• Prior experience with bioinformatics data processing and analysis, showcasing a relevant domain understanding.
• Practical experience with cloud computing platforms and containerization technologies, enabling scalable deployments.
• Pioneer Model Development & Optimization: The Machine Learning Engineer will be at the forefront, meticulously evaluating and re-engineering state-of-the-art AI models across the entire spectrum of imaging.
• This includes developing solutions for de novo protein design, structure identification, and dynamics in single-particle CryoEM, as well as integrating light microscopy and multi-omics data for cross-domain mapping of in situ and in vivo collected data.
• Your deep technical acumen will transform complex algorithms into practical, high-impact tools.
